QuestData.Title: Not In Your House
QuestData.Description: $GSir:Madame;, we have located the saberon's alpha male just outside our gates!$B$BWe believe that slaying him will send any remaining saberon running with their tails between their legs, but the beast is positively massive!$B$BI do not wish to call upon you once more, but you are the only one capable of this task.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Ripgut just outside Fort Wrynn.
